title: Brighouse Boundary Walk Route

images.title: Richard Kay / Rail Crossing on Brighouse Boundary Walk
images.caption: Rail Crossing on Brighouse Boundary Walk. The River Calder and Cromwell Bottom can be seen in the distance

images.title: Richard Kay / Quarry Track and Footpaths in Strangstry Wood
images.caption: Quarry Track and Footpaths in Strangstry Wood. The footpath junction lies on the Brighouse Boundary Walk on the descent to the valley floor. The Footpath Arrow marker is visible. On the left of the footpaths is, what seems to be an old quarry track leading from workings adjacent to Boothroyd Lane down to the disused Tag Cut on the Calder and Hebble Navigation. I have yet to determine the nature of the stone blocks, which appear to be part of the track.

images.title: Humphrey Bolton, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: The River Colne and the Huddersfield Broad Canal, Bradley, Huddersfield. Looking east from the Bradley viaduct. The buildings and the pipe bridge are part of Huddersfield Sewage Works. The former 19C church, now used for other purposes, can be seen on the left.

images.title: Footpath - Brighouse Boundary Walk - off Village Street by Betty Longbottom, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Norwood Green in Calderdale

images.title: The Brighouse boundary walk on Scar Edge, Elland by Humphrey Bolton, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Scar Edge, Elland

images.title: Footbridge over Wyke Beck by Ian S, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Footbridge over Wyke Beck in Bailiff Bridge. The village is located just north of Brighouse.

images.title: Brighouse Marina by Humphrey Bolton, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Brighouse Marina

images.title: The Red Rooster, Elland Road, Brighouse by Alexander P Kapp, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: The Red Rooster, Elland Road, Brighouse

description: A circular walk exploring the area around the town of Brighouse in West Yorkshire. The 18 mile walk visits Norwood Green and Hartshead and includes a waterside stretch along the River Calder.
